113.content:
Tina always had an issue for being small in the chest department. Yuki was well endowed, but at least she wouldn't call her flat chested like Maya did every so often.

It was especially hard for her being on a tropical island and having to wear bikinis all the time, the smaller size would become even more apparent. And at her age she really didn't expect to grow any more.

At least that's what she thought..

It was the Island's carnival season, and various traders had come from neighboring islands bringing in all sorts of trinkets and wares to sell to the tourists that would flood the in at this time of year. Tina was off duty and exploring all the items for sale by the various merchants, when she came across a booth being taken care of by an old lady.

After rummaging around some hand made jewelry, she came across a cat shaped necklace seeming made from bamboo.

"Ohh, this looks pretty, how much?"

The old lady looks up and sees the item in Tina’s hands "Oh that thing? Now how did that get there?"

"Hum?"

"This my dear, is a very special necklace, and I'm surprised it has chosen you as it's bearer."

Tina looks kind of surprised "Chosen?"

"Yes, you see, it's a very unique item, given to me when I was about your age. Its said to make ones wishes come true, but not in the way they would expect."

Tina begins to think this is some sort of sales pitch to bump up the price, so she tries to cut the lady short and gets straight to the punch. "Huh... well it looks very pretty, I'm still interested in it but I don’t have a lot of money, how much?"

"It's yours. As I said, it was given to me and it has now chosen you. Have fun with it, but be mindful of its powers."

"Gee, thanks!" Tina replies surprisingly. The nekomimi rushes off, necklace in hand, and heads home. Maya greets her at the doorway in her usual mocking style.

"Hey flat-so! where have you been? We got to get started on dinner, hurry up and get your uniform on."

Tina shoots a dirty look back at her but holds her own; she rushes upstairs and begins to get ready

But what bothered her most was the fact that it was one of Maya’s old uniforms, and they had not had the chance to get it adjusted to her size yet. This was more noticeable in the chest area, since Tina’s bust was a lot smaller than Maya’s, the cloth would sag there.

11531.content:
It was a quiet afternoon on the island, Tina was grabbing some groceries for the inn when she spotted something out of the corner of her eye at the local fruit stand.

Tina: Hey, what's this? I've never seen this fruit before

Shopkeeper: Not sure, it came mixed in a batch from a delivery we got in today... I was actually thinking about throwing it out.

Tina: Is it spoiled or something?

Shopkeeper: No, it smells fresh enough, and it has good texture.

Tina: I'll take it then!

Shopkeeper: Are you sure?

Tina: Yeah, why not?

Tina scoops up the odd looking fruit, paid the shopkeeper and started on her way home.

115312.content:
Tina thought about eating the fruit right away, she was sort of hungry after all. But she figured she cold hold out until she got home and washed her hands, after all, she had been out and about all day long. As soon as she came into the inn, she left it on the table in the lobby and headed upstairs to the upper restroom.

In the meantime, Maya was coming out of the kitchen, having heard someone arriving. “Tina, is that you?” she asked. “Did you bring me that Mango from the market like I asked?”. There was no reply.

“Man that girl can never do anything right” said Maya with a frustrated expression as she glanced across the room. Her eyes spotted the fruit on the table, and she walked over and picked it up, taking a whiff. “This sure isn’t mango, but it smells really sweet. Maybe I can use it as a substitute in the cake I’m making”.

With that she carried the fruit back into the kitchen, where there already were several ingredients and mixes going on. Grabbing a knife, she slices the fruit in half.

1412.content:
A gentle tinkling of a bell was the first noise Kimi heard as she entered a lost cavern on the tropical island known as Caribbean Blue.

She, Nekonny and Maya were busy looking for a bell to return the small brown cat back to her nekomimi form since the ancient bell at the church was the one Kimi was using. At first Nekonny was skeptical that another bell existed, however the tablets Alice had deciphered said that there was at least one other bell of similar properties.

One text noted a bell that was most likely meant to be a big bell, as the words roughly translated to that. After a long search they had arrived there.

The bell before them was indeed bigger than the one where Kimi, Mika, and Muna had lived prior, but seemed just as magical.

"Looks like that tablet was right, there really was a bell here." Nekonny said.

"Yeah, but it looks so big, how're we going to move it?" Maya asked, when Kimi went by and inspected it.

"Well maybe if we rang it..." she began tapping the bell, when it began to glow. A second later it replaced her own, which was on Maya's neck now.

"Hey, it worked!" Maya said.

Kimi was about to reply but felt odd as she grew...

14521.content:
A week had passed since the Nekobell incident, and Kimi had suddenly become ill. Her body temperature was high, her belly hurt, and her breathing had become irregular.

"Maybe we should give her some space...", Mika said to Muna as they both stood and looked over their young roommate. "We should go get her something to help her feel better.", Muna suggested, Mika nodding in agreement. "We'll be back soon, okay, Kimi?", Mika whispered to her, "Try to get some rest while we're gone." Kimi nodded weakly, and the twins left.

Kimi began to feel sleepy, slowly closing her eyes, hoping she would be better soon. Above all else, what she really wanted was for Nekonny to be there. She was soon fast asleep and dreaming of the feline she loved.

Meanwhile, however, something was happening to her... Right around her several soft pink nipples...
14521.title: The Changes Begin...

choices: The next day, they've grown larger and Kimi leaves before the twins can see them
The next day, they've grown larger and the twins discover them
145212.content:
Kimi woke up later with a yawn, suddenly feeling much better. She got up to try walking--and felt a strange extra weight underneath her...

She looked under herself and gasped. She had grown eight small lumps along her belly... Kimi had grown breasts, though she didn't know at this point what they were or where they came from. "Oh my... What are these?", she wondered out loud to herself. Just then, she heard Mika and Muna returning. She quickly layed back down, hiding her new breasts, just as they came in.

Mika was carrying a large fish in her mouth. "Mmphmmhm...", she said with the fish still in her mouth. "I think she said you look alot better.", Muna translated. Kimi nodded. "Yeah, I feel much better! Must've been a passing thing.", she replied, though as they ate their fish together, Kimi kept on silently wondering what these new things she had grown were, and why she now had them...

It took alot of work to try and hide them from Mika and Muna without looking suspicious, but somehow she managed it. Of course, she realized as she went to sleep that night, that she would have to show them eventually...
145212.title: Nekobell, Down it fell, Now my breasts have grown

choices: She manages to hide, and tries to think of what she'll do next
1452122.content:
Kimi slowly wakes up the next morning to...her breasts being poked and licked...?

Her eyes fly open, and she looks at herself. She squeals in shock as she discovers that not only have they gotten bigger overnight, but Mika and Muna have seen them, Muna poking one with her paw, Mika licking another!

Kimi jumps up, startling the twins. "What are you doing?!", she screams. "W-We were just curious about those...things on your belly!", Mika replies, trembling a little. "Y-Yeah... They look kinda like those things human girls have on their chests, and we were really curious about them...", Muna adds with a nod.

"Please, Kimi, tell us where you got those...", Mika suddenly murrs, "Muna and I want some so badly... To attract mates..." Kimi shakes her head in frustration. "I don't know where they came from! They grew overnight!" Mika and Muna laugh when she says this. "Overnight? Without your knowledge? Who do you think you're fooling, Kimi?", Muna replies, examining Kimi's boobs again. "Where did they really come from?", Mika asks again.

Before the twins can do anything else or ask another question, Kimi has already jumped out the window. She runs down to the road and continues running, hoping no one will notice her, or her new tits.
1452122.title: Discovery

Just her luck, however, she was soon spotted by Nekonny. Blushing deeply, she tries to hide her boobs as Nekonny runs over to her.

"Hey, Kimi! Are you okay? I heard you were si--", he says, stopping himself in mid-sentence as he sees Kimi's breasts. "Woah, where did you get those?!"

Kimi's blush goes even deeper as she tries to explain what little she knows about the situation. "I... I just woke up with these, and... Well... I have no idea where they came from, but... I... Oh, you must think I'm such a freak now...!"

"Why would I think that?", Nekonny asks, moving a bit closer to her. "To be honest..."

info.brief_description: The first and so far only expansion story of the girls from the webcomic Caribbean Blue.
info.description:
This is the only expansion story following the cute catgirls from the lesser-known but very entertaining webcomic Caribbean Blue {katbox.net/cblueen}. Full permission to post this interactive has been granted by CB creator Nekonny. The main focus is on the four main females:

- Tina

- Yuki

- Maya

- Kimi

Here's what expansion types the stories will focus on:

* Weight Gain
* Inflation
* Breast Expansion
* Butt Expansion
* Fruitification
* Muscle Growth
* Giantess
* Hourglass

Here are some rules for this story.

1. Feel free to mix expansion types within one storyline, but please try to keep the focus on the type that was originally chosen.

2. Sexual content is fine, even encouraged, but try not to make it too graphic.

3. No insanely massive expansion or growth. Simple enough a request, right?

4. USE PROPER SPELLING AND GRAMMAR SKILLS. I cannot stress this rule enough!

5. Killing characters is not allowed unless they get restored somehow.

6. Options for male characters to be expanded will be deleted.
